name: IJustSneezed
0:
”Alexa, I just sneezed”
”Alexa, ask I just sneezed to bless me”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: i just sneezed
des: So, you've just sneezed and there is nobody around to say "Bless You", Of course, you could say it to yourself, but it's not quite the same. Well worry no more, you can now say "Alexa, I just sneezed" and Alexa will say "Bless You" and give you an interesting fact about sneezing.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
